alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant; Kay; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 3:59AM CDT until June 10 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Northern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Southeastern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 358 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kaw Lake to 3 miles east of Lamont, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Blackwell AWOS measured a 62 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Blackwell, Tonkawa, Medford, Newkirk, Garber, Billings, Lamont, Kaw City, Red Rock, Breckenridge, Marland, Braman, Hunter, Fairmont, Deer Creek, Kildare, Chilocco, Kaw Lake and Hardy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
